app_name: Lok L0k: Watch TV drama, Movie
description:
Lok L0k — Your All-Access Pass to the World of Movies.

This ultimate movie companion is designed for film lovers who want it all — discovery, excitement, and a front-row seat to every story.

- Browse Your Way – Explore films by genre, rating, or release date, and find exactly what fits your mood.

- Never Miss a Premiere – Get instant alerts for new releases and upcoming must-see premieres.

- Your Watchlist, Your Rules – Save the titles you can’t wait to see and track the ones you’ve conquered.

- Rate & Relive – Share your take on movies and TV shows, and watch reviews from critics and fans alongside cast info and full details.

- IPTV Smart Player – Enjoy smooth, integrated playback with a built-in, smart viewing experience.

Download the app and step into a cinematic universe like never before.

Data Source Transparency

All movie and TV details — including images, ratings, and descriptions — are powered by The Movie Database (TMDB).
We use the TMDB API to bring you this rich library of content, but we are not endorsed or certified by TMDB.

Important Disclaimer

This app is an entertainment guide, not a streaming service.
We are not affiliated with, or endorsed by, any third-party content providers or film studios.
No movies or TV shows are streamed or hosted within the app.
All trademarks, copyrights, and other intellectual property remain the property of their respective owners.

LοkIоk is your personal space for watching and following a variety of shows and films. With a growing collection of dramas, movies, and short content, it’s easy to keep track of what you love — and discover something new along the way.
From quick mini-dramas to full-length episodes, lοkIоk offers flexible viewing options to fit your time and mood. Download episodes to watch offline, browse curated lists, or simply explore by genre and region.
Whether you're here for light entertainment or following a full series, lοkIоk helps make your viewing more organized and enjoyable.

Features at a Glance
*  Flexible Viewing – Short and long-form videos for any schedule

*  Download to Watch Later – Save shows and enjoy without needing internet

*  Daily Recommendations – Handpicked selections updated regularly

*  User Reactions – Read and share comments on episodes

*  Smooth Playback – Optimized for clear, stable streaming in HD

LοkIоk is designed for viewers who enjoy discovering and following shows on their own terms. Start watching today and create your own watchlist with ease.

Aplikasi yang dapat digunakan untuk melihat kepesertaan bantuan sosial (BPNT, BST, dan PKH). Pengguna dapat melihat daftar penerima bantuan sosial yang ada di sekitar wilayah administrasinya dan dapat memberikan sanggahan terhadap penerima bantuan yang dianggap tidak layak. Selain itu Pengguna juga dapat mengusulkan dirinya sendiri atau tetangganya yang dianggap layak untuk masuk ke dalam DTSEN dan/atau menerima bantuan sosial.

Translate between up to 249 languages. Feature support varies by language:
• Text: Translate between languages by typing
• Offline: Translate with no Internet connection
• Instant camera translation: Translate text in images instantly by just pointing your camera
• Photos: Translate text in taken or imported photos
• Dictation: Translate spoken words and phrases
• Conversations: Translate bilingual conversations on the fly
• Transcribe: Continuously translate someone speaking a different language in near real-time
• Handwriting: Draw text characters instead of typing
• Phrasebook: Star and save translated words and phrases for future reference

Permissions notice:
• Microphone for speech translation
• Camera for translating text via the camera
• Photos for importing photos from your library

Build a stronger connection with your Deen, one day at a time.

Staying consistent with prayer. Making time to read even one verse a day. Remembering to say Alhamdulillah when life gets heavy. These are the habits that build Iman, and Muslim Pro is here to help you build them.

Whether you’re navigating faith at college, raising a family, or rediscovering prayer, Muslim Pro walks with you, every day, in every season of your Iman.

Designed to help you grow in faith:
- Prayer reminders (Athan) tailored to your location, helping you never miss a Salah
- Daily Quran goals to keep you reading and reflecting
- Track your progress with streaks, reminders, and reflections
- Guided Duas & Azkar, chosen for real-life moments
- Personalised Islamic content that fits your journey, your pace
- Discover halal spots & mosques nearby, even while travelling.
- Learn through short videos, articles & tips, no pressure, just progress

The Complete Qur’an Experience
- All 114 Surahs with audio recitations by renowned Qaris like Mishari Alafasy and Abdul Basit
- Word-by-word translations in English and other languages
- Tajweed color guides and recitation tips to improve your fluency
- Last read verse bookmarks & Ayah highlights
- Memorization mode with repetition, verse selection, and audio speed control
- Light & dark modes, font size adjustments for easier reading
- Verse, Surah, or keyword search
- Authentic Arabic script with Uthmani calligraphy
- Short Tafsir to help reflect on meaning
- Daily Ayah reminders to stay spiritually connected

Small steps lead to lasting change. Muslim Pro helps you stay motivated, feel accountable, and keep growing in your faith, day by day.


Unlock the full Muslim Pro Experience with Premium
Ad-Free Experience: Enjoy uninterrupted access to all features.
Exclusive Tools: Access offline reading, audio recitations, customizable prayer widgets, and interactive lessons.

Premium Subscription Plans
$12.99 per month
$34.99 per year

These prices are for United States customers. Pricing may vary in other countries, and charges may be converted to your local currency.
Subscriptions renew automatically unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Manage your subscription and auto-renewal settings in your Apple account.

Supported Languages
Muslim Pro is available in multiple languages, including English, Bahasa Indonesia, Bahasa Melayu, Français, العربية, اردو, and more.

Pro Tips for the Best Experience:
Keep the app updated for the most accurate prayer times and reading features.
Enable auto-location to adjust prayer notifications based on your area.
Open the app daily for seamless access to verified prayer times, Qibla tools, a prayer space finder, and a Halal restaurant finder.

Millions of Muslims around the world use Muslim Assistant app to see prayer times and find Qibla direction.

Muslim Assistant, the most downloaded prayer time application in all Muslim countries, includes many useful features.

MUSLIM ASSISTANT FEATURES

Prayer Times: The application shows you the most accurate azan times according to your location or region. If you want, you can receive prayer time notifications with Azan sound or with other sound options.

Qibla Finder: You can find Mecca and Kaaba on the map, and you can determine the Kaaba direction of your location in the most accurate way. With the help of Compass Mode, It is easy to see where the Kaaba is located even when you are offline, and you can pray according to Islamic rules.

Dhikr Counter: You can easily make dhikrs, record your dhikr counts and dhikr loops.

Friday Messages: You can send special Friday messages to your loved ones.

Nearby Mosques: You can see the Mosques and Masjids closest to your location on the map.

The Quran: You can read the Quran in 40+ different languages and there are also transliteration options. You can see the Juz list and change the text size as well. You have the option to listen to the Quran recited by famous reciters, providing a unique and diverse listening experience.

Kaaba Live Broadcast: You can watch the Kaaba live 24 hours a day.

Esma-ul Husna: You can see the 99 names of Allah and their meanings and listen to Esma hymn and make dhikr of each Name.

Hijri Calendar: You can follow the dates of important islamic days such as Ramadan, Laylat-ul Qadr, Eid al-Fitr and Eid al-Adha.

Message Editor: You can choose existing messages or compose new ones, with a variety of background options, using the editor tool and send your custom messages to your loved ones.

Notes:

For proper Qibla Finder usage, you need to hold your phone on a flat surface and keep it away from electromagnetic fields and metal objects. If it is necessary, you can manually rearrange your location through pressing the marker.

Because the app uses your device's location settings to give you prayer times, please kindly be aware your location settings are open and up to date.

May Allah bless us all.

تطبيق مساعد المسلم هو الأفضل لتذكير المسلم بالواجبات اليومية: أوقات الصلاة، إتجاه القبلة، كما يحتوي أيضا على القرآن الكريم، الذِكر، محرر الرسائل، رسائل يوم الجمعة، تقويم رمضان وأوقات الإفطار والسحور، وأكثر من ذلك انه مثالي لواجباتك الإسلامية، فأنه تطبيق إسلامي متكامل.

----------------------------------------

If you choose to purchase Muslim Assistant Premium, payment will be charged to your iTunes account, and your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. Auto-renewal may be turned off at any time by going to your settings in the iTunes Store after purchase. Current Muslim Assistant Premium subscription price starts at $2.49 USD/month and one-month(Monthly Auto - Renewal) and twelve-month(Yearly Auto - Renewal) or Lifetime (One Time Purchase) packages are available. There is free trial for yearly subscriptions, subscription begins immediately but billed when the trial is over. Prices are in US dollars, may vary in countries other than the US and are subject to change without notice. No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during the active subscription period. If you don’t choose to purchase Muslim Assistant Premium, you can simply continue using Muslim Assistant for free.

This application is subject to Apple's Standard End User License Agreement (EULA).

Auto Clicker: AG Tap Assistant, Scroll & Dual Chat

Auto Clicker is a powerful auto clicker that automates taps, swipes, scrolling — and even enables dual chat for social media apps. No root required. Perfect for gaming, testing, or multitasking.

Key Features:

- Single & Multi Tap Modes – Automate one or more tap areas

- In-App Macro Recorder – Record your tap flows and replay them to automate actions within Auto Clicker.

- Custom Intervals – Set delay, speed, and repeat timing

- Floating Control Panel – Manage clicks over any app

- Auto Scroll – Smooth, hands-free scrolling

- Dual Chat Support – Use two social accounts simultaneously

- Save & Load Tasks – Easily reuse recorded tap flows

Click smarter, not harder — with Auto Clicker!

Alkitab Bahasa Indonesia (Indonesian Bible) with English Translation for iPhone and iPad

Experience the Alkitab Bahasa Indonesia (Indonesian Bible) seamlessly paired with an English translation, designed for quick access and easy reading on your iPhone and iPad.

Key Features:

Fast Navigation & Search: Instantly locate verses and keywords.
Bookmarks, Annotations & History: Save, highlight, and revisit your favorite verses.
Completely Free: No ads, no trackers, no sign-up—just pure scripture at your fingertips.
Helpful Tip: Tap the verse number to add notes, highlights, or bookmarks and personalize your study.

I hope this app serves as a blessing to you and those you share it with.

Get God’s Word for free on your devices with the Bible App by YouVersion. Connect with God through Scripture by reading, listening, Plans, Daily Refresh, Verse of the Day, and so much more!

Choose from 1,750+ languages and 2,500+ Bible versions. Make it your Bible by adding Friends, choosing Plans, creating Verse Images, highlighting, and making notes.

Bring your friends with you and explore the Bible together. Have honest conversations about Scripture. Grow together and share what you discover.

People are reading, listening to, watching, and sharing the free Bible App by YouVersion on over 500 million devices worldwide. Join the global Community today! Download the Bible App.


EXPLORE GOD’S WORD
* Choose from thousands of Bible versions in over 1,750 languages
* Pick from over 60 languages for your Bible App interface
* Download select Bible versions to access when you’re offline
* Listen to select Bible versions and enjoy skip, playback speed, and timer controls.
* Learn more about the Verse of the Day in Guided Scripture with an engaging video and personal reflection questions
* Tap through Scripture and prayer prompts in Guided Prayer, or write your own prayers using the Prayer feature
* Choose from thousands of Plans that focus on specific topics, portions of Scripture, or the entire Bible in a year
* Watch videos from Christian organizations such as Bible Project and The Chosen
* Search for what the Bible says about any topic you’re wondering about
* Tap on a verse to see your Notes and related content such as videos, Plans, and study notes

MAKE IT YOUR BIBLE
* Themes let you select a color palette for your entire Bible App experience
* Create and download Verse Images for any verse you’d like—it’s shareable art
* Highlight with custom colors and create notes
* Bookmark passages to share, memorize, and keep at the front of your mind
* Share verses with friends using social media, email, or text
* Add notes on any verse—make them private or let your Friends see them
* Access your account from any supported device
* Adjust lighting, font, font size, and line spacing for easy reading

BRING YOUR FRIENDS ALONG
* Center your friendships around Scripture by adding your Friends to the Bible App
* See an activity feed that shows what you and your Friends are noting, bookmarking, and highlighting
* Comment on the Verse of the Day with your Friends—ask questions and share how God is speaking to you
* Write your own prayers and share them with your Friends to pray together
* Do Plans together and discuss what you’re learning

CONNECT WITH YOUVERSION
* Contact Support from inside the Bible App
* Join the @youversion Community on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, TikTok & Pinterest
* Catch up on the latest at blog.youversion.com
* Access the Bible online at bible.com

Download the world’s #1 Bible App and enjoy the Bible experience loved by millions!

Cek pajak kendaraan bermotor Anda secara online dengan mudah dan cepat menggunakan E Plat.
Dengan hanya memasukkan nomor plat kendaraan, Anda dapat melihat informasi pajak kendaraan seperti jatuh tempo, nominal pajak, dan status STNK secara akurat.

E Plat mendukung pengecekan pajak untuk kendaraan motor dan mobil dari berbagai wilayah di Indonesia.  
Cocok untuk Anda yang ingin cek pajak tanpa harus datang ke Samsat, kapan saja dan di mana saja.

Fitur Utama:
- Cek pajak kendaraan motor & mobil secara online.
- Hasil pengecekan cepat, akurat, dan resmi.
- Tampilan informasi pajak yang jelas dan mudah dipahami.
- Tidak perlu login atau registrasi.
- Dukungan untuk berbagai wilayah di Indonesia:
  - DKI Jakarta  
  - Aceh  
  - Jambi  
  - Jawa Barat (Jabar)  
  - Jawa Tengah (Jateng)  
  - Jawa Timur (Jatim)  
  - Yogyakarta (Jogja / Yogya)  
  - Banten  
  - Kalimantan Barat (Kalbar)  
  - Kalimantan Timur (Kaltim)  
  - Bali
  - Lampung
  - Bengkulu
  - Kepulauan Riau (Kepri, Batam)
  - Sumatra Utara (Sumut)
  - Riau
  - Sulawesi Barat
  - Sulawesi Tengah
  - Sumatera Barat
  - Nusa Tenggara Barat


Aplikasi ini sangat membantu untuk:
- Cek pajak STNK sebelum jatuh tempo.
- Cek pajak kendaraan berdasarkan plat nomor.
- Mengetahui status pajak kendaraan sebelum membeli kendaraan bekas (opsen,sdwkllj).
- Menghindari denda pajak kendaraan karena telat bayar.

Unduh sekarang dan pastikan kendaraan Anda selalu taat pajak!

Azkar App is your daily companion for enhancing spirituality and facilitating Islamic practices. It provides a comprehensive collection of authentic Athkar (remembrances) and supplications from the Qur’an and Sunnah, along with innovative features designed to meet the needs of Muslims in their daily lives.

Join millions of users and experience a complete spiritual journey with Azkar App, crafted to serve every Muslim.

Key Features
- Morning & Evening Athkar, Sleep & Wake-up Athkar, Prayer Athkar, and more: A modern and user-friendly interface with an audio player and repetition counter.
- My Athkar Section: Create and customize your own Athkar according to your needs.
- Qur’an (Reading, Tafsir, and Audio): Enjoy an eye-friendly reading experience with font and color customization, translations in multiple languages, and easy-to-understand Tafsir. You can also listen or download recitations by your favorite reciter.
- Khatmah: Set a Qur’an completion plan with daily reading reminders.
- Prayer Times, Qibla Direction, and Hijri Calendar: View the Islamic calendar, accurate prayer times, and Qibla direction, with a monthly prayer calendar that can be shared.
- Adhan & Full Adhan Alerts: Choose from a variety of Adhan voices with pre-Adhan reminders.
- Reminders Section: Create reminders for specific Athkar, supplications, or important events with customizable sound and repetition options.
- Daily Content Updates: Get Dua of the Day, Ayah of the Day, and Video of the Day with valuable tips and inspiring stories.
- Various Azkar: A variety of supplications with customizable backgrounds, ready for sharing.
- Ramadan Section: Essential Ramadan features including Prayer & Fasting Tracker, Daily Duas, Zakat Calculator, and more.
- Daily Quranic Benefits: Daily insights into Qur’anic verses for contemplation.
- Worship Trackers: Tools to track Athkar, fasting, and prayers, helping you stay consistent and improve commitment.
- Tasbih Counter: Perform electronic Dhikr with an easy-to-use digital Tasbih.
- Ruqyah (Islamic Healing): Authentic Ruqyah texts from the Qur’an and Sunnah, with an audio listening option.
- Prophet Muhammad’s (PBUH) Biography in Videos: Engaging video content about the life of Prophet Muhammad (PBUH).
- 99 Names of Allah.
- Surah Al-Kahf Reminder for Fridays.
- Hajj & Umrah Guide: Step-by-step instructions for performing Hajj and Umrah.
- Islamic & Ramadan WhatsApp Stickers: Updated Islamic and Ramadan sticker packs with easy export to WhatsApp.
- Istighfar (Forgiveness) Alerts: Get reminders for seeking forgiveness and making Dhikr at customizable intervals (e.g., every 10 minutes or once a day).
- Qiyam-ul-Layl (Night Prayer) Alerts.
- Live Activities & Widgets: Quick access to features like prayer times, Hijri date, various azkar, Khatmah, prayer tracker, fasting tracker, and more from the home screen and lock screen.
- Professional & Customizable Design: Choose your favorite background, and enable dark mode for a better visual experience.
- …and many more great features you’ll love!

Why Azkar App?
Azkar App is a comprehensive Islamic tool, combining authenticity with modern technology to fulfill your spiritual and daily needs.

Take this opportunity to increase your daily rewards and strengthen your connection with Allah. Download Azkar App now and embark on an uninterrupted spiritual journey filled with Dhikr and supplication.

Quran 360 is a comprehensive Al Quran app that offers a complete Quranic experience in the palm of your hand.

With features like
- Tarteel Mistake Detection (NEW)
- The Quran Teacher
- reading the Quran with Tajweed,
- word-by-word tafsir and translation (Quran English),
- listening to famous reciters (Quran Audio),
- creating Quran playlists,
- bookmarking and searching,
- Quran offline mode, and more,
equips you to learn, comprehend, recite, and memorize the Al Quran with ease. Whether you’re a beginner or an advanced learner of the Holy Quran, this app is perfect for you.

Perfect your Quranic Recitation with Tarteel Mistake Detection (NEW)

Our newly introduced Tarteel Mistake Detection feature acts as your personal Quran teacher, alerting you instantly to any missed or incorrect words in your recitation. This powerful tool helps you learn the correct recitation precisely, enhancing your Quranic study and practice.

Your Quran Teacher

With the Quran Teacher, you can ask anything about the Quran and Islam and get answers tailored to your needs, in seconds. This is a great way to strengthen your knowledge and understanding of the Quran and Islam.

Read Al Quran with Tajweed & Offline

Quran 360 is getting ready to take its place in the stores to eliminate difficulties such as the inability to adjust the font sizes, eye-catching designs, and other details that negatively affect the reading experience. It promises a more fluid reading experience.

If you learn the Holy Quran with Tajweed, you will be able to pronounce the Quranic verses correctly, reciting them in Tarteel and your recitation will sound more beautiful.

With Quran 360 app, you will always be able to read Allah's words without making any mistakes. Enjoy the serene recitations and enlightening insights of the Holy Quran even without an internet connection.

Al Quran Audio Mode with Famous Reciters

The most famous aspect of Quran 360’s listening feature is that it includes different reciters. You can listen to every ayah you want from the voices of famous reciters in Quran 360.

You can listen to surahs with recordings of well-known reciters such as Akram Al-Alaqmi (Gapless), Abdul Rashid Sufi, Abdul Muhsin al Qasim, Abdullah Mahrood, and more.

Memorize Quran Fast and Easily

With the ability to enhance the reading speed of the Holy Quran, you have the opportunity to recite the complete book swiftly. This feature proves valuable whether you wish to bypass memorized verses.

The Search in Al Quran Kareem functionality empowers efficient Quran memorization through its user-friendly strategy, effectively recognizing analogous verses (Mutashābihāt) for rapid comprehension.

Bookmarks and Playlists

It is very easy to bookmark surahs, verses, and Tilawat e Quran Kareem wherever you like.

With our playlist feature, you can listen to beautiful Quran playlists directly from the home page and create your own playlist.

Quran Tafsir - Guided Interpretations

Tafsir books demonstrate the real meanings and other details of the Ayah when they are read together with the Quran. You can see why that verse was revealed or after which event it was conveyed to the Prophet Muhammad (SAW).

Use Quran 360 to read different tafsirs and gain a deeper understanding.

Verified Al Quran Translations -  Quran English, قران كريم, Coran, Koran, Al Quran Bangla

It contains 40+ Al Quran Kareem translations, transliterations, and tafsir/commentary.

The application includes translations of many languages ​​such as English, Turkish, French, German, Spanish, Russian, Arabic, Malay, Indonesian, Hindi, Urdu, Bangla, Persian, Bulgarian, Swedish, Italian, and more.

Assalamualaikum,

Kaum muslimin, apakah anda pernah mengalami:
•Anda ingin memulai suatu aktivitas, ingin berdoa seperti yg diajarkan Nabi, namun anda tidak tahu apa doanya?
•Anda mengalami kejadian yg menyenangkan/menyusahkan, ingin berdoa sesuai yg dicontohkan Nabi, namun tidak hafal lafalnya?
•Anda sering lupa lafal doa/dzikir yg anda baca? Tercampur satu dgn yg lain?
•Anda punya buku kumpulan doa/dzikir lengkap, tapi malas membukanya, harus mencari di daftar isi, tidak selalu dibawa karena tebal/berat, dll?
•Anda sudah mencatatnya di gadget, tapi kemudian bingung mencarinya, lupa dimana menyimpannya, menghabiskan waktu, dll?
•Semua hal di atas membuat anda merasa berat, sehingga anda malah jadi jarang berdoa/berdzikir??

Bila ya, maka semoga hal berikut bisa sedikit meringankan beban anda. Alhamdulillah, kini telah hadir app "Apa Doanya"!

Keutamaan:
•Memuat 500+ doa, dzikir, adab dll! Bersumber dari Quran & Hadits Shahih/Hasan (insya Allah, sesuai penelitian ahli hadits), anda bisa dgn tenang mengamalkannya!
•Dilengkapi Dzikir Pagi Sore & Dzikir Setelah Shalat Fardhu! Cocok dijadikan app wirid/doa harian anda!
•Fitur "Cari"! Mencari doa/dzikir yg anda inginkan, tinggal ketik!
•Fitur "Favorit"! Punya doa/dzikir yg anda senangi? Simpan ke favorit agar mudah dimunculkan lagi!
•Ukuran teks bisa diubah! Teks arab/lainnya terlalu kecil? Silakan ubah sesuai selera anda!
•Tersedia "Mode Malam"! Tidak silau saat baca doa di tempat gelap!
•Pengingat dzikir! Tidak lagi terlewat dzikir pagi/sore!
•Berbagi ke medsos, chat dll! Nikmati limpahan pahala sebanyak yg mengamalkannya!
•Bekerja offline! Tidak perlu internet saat menggunakannya!
•GRATIS!! Tidak dibatasi waktu, tidak ada fitur yg dimatikan, semuanya FULL!

Semoga kita semua menjadi muslim yg banyak berdoa/berdzikir di setiap keadaan.

Mohon sebarkan. "Siapa yg menunjukkan kpd kebaikan, maka ia akan mendapat pahala seperti orang yg melakukannya." HR. Muslim 3509.

- Real-time camera translation: point your camera at text to instantly translate what you see
- Photo translation: translate text in taken or imported photos
- Dictation: translate what you speak out loud
- Text to speech: hear your translated text read out loud
- File translation: translate text from files
- Quick detection: translations begin as you type
- Alternative translations: explore different options for single words and short phrases
- Favorites: save words and phrases for future reference
- History: easily find, edit, and reuse past translations
- Transliteration: read translations of non-Latin languages, such as Japanese or Russian, in the Latin alphabet
- Glossary: translate key words and phrases as defined by you or your organization (available with a paid plan)
- Tone: choose a formal or informal tone (available with a paid plan)
- Handwriting: draw text characters instead of typing (available on iPad)
- DeepL Write: get intelligent writing suggestions to help you create clear, error-free, and impactful texts with ease

Whenever you need translation during your travels, business trips or while studying a language just bring Papago, a smart parrot who can translate multiple languages for you.

▶ What does ‘Papago’ mean? 
In Esperanto, Papago refers to a parrot, a bird with language abilities. 
Papago supports 14 languages : Korean, English, Japanese, Chinese (Simplified/Traditional), Spanish, French, Vietnamese, Thai, Indonesian, Russian, German, Italian and Arabic. 

▶ Main features
1) Text Translation
Real-time text translation for phrases and words

2) Image Translation
Automatic recognition and translation of text in the image by taking a picture and pressing the button 

3) Voice Translation
Real-time voice translation to both text and audio

4) Offline translation
Can translate even in offline

5) Conversation Translation 
Simultaneously speak in each other’s language when talking one-on-one with a foreigner

6) Handwriting Translation
Handwriting translation that finds the correct word and translation when you write using your finger

7) Website Translation 
Automatic translation for all content when you include the URL of a foreign website

8) Edu
Taking a picture of the passage you want to study will create a 
My Note that you can use to study passages and words

9) Dictionary
Dictionary information provided to check additional meanings other than initial translation results

Be confident anytime, anywhere with your translating partner Papago!

Papago Facebook Like :  https://www.facebook.com/NaverPapago
Papago Instagram Follow : https://www.instagram.com/papago_naver/


※ Speech recognition permission provided by the mobile OS is used to provide voice translation and dialog translation in Vietnamese, Thai, Indonesian, Russian, and Italian. If you use voice translation or dialog translation in these languages after granting speech recognition permission, only voice data will be sent to Apple as per Apple's policy; no other information will be sent.



※ Supporting iOS 15.0 or above

Pleco is the ultimate Chinese learning companion: an integrated dictionary / document reader / flashcard system with fullscreen handwriting input and live OCR, from a company that's been making the world's best mobile Chinese learning apps since 2001.

Major features: ($ = paid add-on)

• Amazing dictionaries. We offer two free built-in dictionaries: the popular open-source CC-CEDICT, with over 110,000 frequently-updated entries, and our own PLC dictionary, with 125,000 entries, parts of speech, and over 25,000 example sentences (with Pinyin). More than two dozen other dictionaries are available as free and paid ($) add-ons, including licensed titles from well-known publishers like Oxford, Longman, FLTRP, Tuttle, SLPH, and Commercial Press.

• Powerful merged search: look up words by Chinese characters, Pinyin (spaces / tones optional), or English, with support for wildcards and full-text search. And no need to tediously flip between all of those dictionaries to find a word - just type in your search term and instantly get a combined, frequency-sorted result list.

• Links and cross-references: easily look up character components, break down words into individual characters, look up lists of words containing a particular character, and search across all dictionaries for example sentences containing a word.

• Gorgeous typography: see it for yourself in our screenshots - we think we're one of the best-looking Chinese dictionaries around. Alternate Kai/Song/Xing-style Chinese fonts are also available ($).

• PRC/HK/Taiwan-friendly: every part of Pleco supports both traditional and simplified, headword readings can be shown in Pinyin and Zhuyin, and some dictionaries even support Cantonese. (note: stroke order diagrams do support traditional characters, but use PRC order)

• Audio: Hear Mandarin and Cantonese for words and example sentences using iOS' free built-in text-to-speech system. We also offer add-ons ($) with native-speaker Mandarin recordings and higher-quality Mandarin TTS.

• Document Reader: bring in text from the clipboard and tap on words in it to instantly look them up. Upgrade ($) adds support for tap-lookups in text, HTML, DOC, DOCX, PDF, and EPUB files. We also offer graded readings ($).

• OCR: look up words simply by pointing your device's camera at them, or by tapping on them in a still image. ($)

• Fullscreen handwriting: use your device's whole screen instead of just a little box. Extremely accurate and highly tolerant of stroke order mistakes. (enhanced $)

• Flashcards: create a card from any dictionary entry with a single button tap, import premade word lists, use advanced memorization techniques like SRS, and study in a variety of modes including fill-in-the-blanks handwriting and tone drills. ($)

• Stroke Order Diagrams: animations showing you how to draw each character; 500 characters for free, 28,000 in paid ($) version.

• User dictionaries: create new dictionary entries right on your device as you encounter new words. ($)

• No ads.

We also offer famously excellent customer support and an active user community at http://www.plecoforums.com. And we're constantly working to make our products better; our sales and customer base have been growing for two decades across 4 different platforms. You can be confident that we'll still be fixing bugs and adding features for years to come.

Paid add-ons can be transferred to other devices that link to your iTunes account just like any other paid iTunes content; simply install our free app, open up the "Add-ons" screen, and tap on the "Restore Purchases" button to activate your purchase on each device.

Please contact us at support@pleco.com, via the form at http://www.pleco.com/contact.html, or using the in-app "Contact Support" command with any questions - we'll be delighted to hear from you.

Aplikasi Cek Pajak Kendaraan Online hadir sebagai alat bantu praktis untuk membantu Anda merencanakan pembayaran pajak motor dan mobil.

Fitur Unggulan Aplikasi:

- Kalkulator Estimasi Pajak Kendaraan
Hitung perkiraan total tagihan Pajak Kendaraan Bermotor (PKB) Anda dengan mudah. Cukup masukkan data kendaraan, dan kalkulator kami akan menyajikan estimasi biayanya sebagai referensi awal. (Hasil perhitungan ini adalah simulasi dan bukan tagihan resmi).

- Rincian Estimasi Pajak
Dapatkan gambaran rincian dari estimasi tagihan Anda. Mulai dari pokok pajak, PKB Opsen, SWDKLLJ, biaya administrasi, hingga denda keterlambatan (jika ada). Rincian ini membantu Anda memahami komponen-komponen pajak.

- Akses Mudah ke Website Samsat Resmi
Kami menyediakan kumpulan tautan langsung ke laman resmi e-Samsat berbagai provinsi di seluruh Indonesia.

- Pengingat Jatuh Tempo Pajak
Manfaatkan fitur pengingat agar tidak terlambat membayar pajak.

Dengan antarmuka yang ramah pengguna, aplikasi ini dirancang untuk membantu Anda mempersiapkan dan merencanakan pembayaran pajak kendaraan dengan lebih baik.

Welcome to the Parallel Space app!

Have you ever faced situation when you need to Log out / Log in and switch between different accounts of one app? If your answer is "Yes" - then you are on the right way. This app was created exactly for users who have multiple social media accounts and who find it difficult to manage.

Apart from accounts duplication Parallel Space can help you to set a password for the application to ensure your data security and protect your privacy. Our app supports almost all popular social media and services.

Main features of the Parallel Space:
- Log into multiple accounts - use one phone to log in multi accounts and stay online.
- Accounts security - allows you to set passcode and log in automatically.
- Passcode - build a privacy zone and protect your private accounts.

Dual Space Lite is a powerful tool that lets you run multiple accounts of the same app simultaneously on one device. Whether for social media, messaging apps, or gaming, you can enjoy seamless access to two or more accounts without the need for constant switching or logging in and out. 

Main Features:

- Multiple Accounts: Run several accounts of the same app simultaneously in one place, saving time and enhancing convenience.
- Custom App Creation: Create and customize apps with a unique name and logo for a personalized experience.
- Direct Chat without Saving Contacts: Initiate conversations with others via messaging apps without having to save their phone numbers in your contacts.
- App Lock with PIN: Protect your privacy by securing the app with a PIN, ensuring that only you can access your private spaces.

Dual Space Lite brings efficiency, security, and flexibility to your multitasking needs, all while keeping your apps organized and secure.
